docs.snippet: LONDON, Jan.18--Three hundred British seamen are being held prisoner and getting inadequate food and drinking water aboard the German tanker that acted as a supply ship to the Graf Spee, according to accounts told today by survivors of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan.18--Three hundred British seamen are being held prisoner and getting inadequate food and drinking water aboard the German tanker that acted as a supply ship to the Graf Spee, according to accounts told today by survivors of the merohantmen sunk by the German pocket battleship.

headline.main: 300 British Seamen Suffer on Nazi Tanker That Supplied Graf Spee, Survivors Relate

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 19--A secretly built warship--a combination raider, supply and prison ship--was reported tonight to have been the auxiliary vessel that accompanied the Nazi raider Admiral Graf Spee over three oceans and carried 300...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 19--A secretly built warship--a combination raider, supply and prison ship--was reported tonight to have been the auxiliary vessel that accompanied the Nazi raider Admiral Graf Spee over three oceans and carried 300 prisoners under conditions that British captives said recalled the "days of slave traders."
